text: the design evolved over time with metal plow shares introduced to improve durability and efficiency the Chinese developed the iron plow during the Han Dynasty further enhancing agricultural techniques in medieval Europe the heavy plow transformed farming in Northern regions with dense soils today modern plows and tractors equipped with advanced technology continue to draw inspiration from these ancient designs ensuring food security and supporting agricultural economies worldwide number five the compass the compass invented in ancient China during the Han Dynasty 206 BC 220 ad transformed navigation and exploration
